org.soulwing.sql.SQLQuery

  • Packages that use SQLQuery 
    Package Description
    org.soulwing.sql
    SQL template and supporting classes

    • Uses of SQLQuery in org.soulwing.sql

      Methods in org.soulwing.sql that return SQLQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.extractingColumn()
      Configures this query to extract the value of the first column.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.extractingColumn(int index)
      Configures this query to extract the value of the given column.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.extractingColumn(String label)
      Configures this query to extract the value of the given column.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.handlingResultWith(ResultSetHandler<T> handler)
      Configures this query to use the given result set handler.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.mappingRowsWith(RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
      Configures this query to use the given row mapper.
      SQLQuery<Void> SQLTemplate.query()
      Creates a query that returns nothing.
      SQLQuery<Void> SQLOperations.query()
      Creates a query that returns nothing.
      <T> SQLQuery<T> SQLTemplate.queryForType(Class<T> type)
      Creates a query for objects of a given type.
      <T> SQLQuery<T> SQLOperations.queryForType(Class<T> type)
      Creates a query for objects of a given type.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.repeatedly()
      Configures this query for repeated execution.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.using(SQLSource source)
      Configures this query to execute the given SQL statement.
      SQLQuery<T> SQLQuery.using(String sql)
      Configures this query to execute the given SQL statement.
